definition: father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album

sentences.english: Elijah is a prophet of the Hebrew Bible or Old Testament.
sentences.chinese: 以利亞是希伯萊聖經或舊約裏的一位先知。

sentences.english: This is an abbreviation for the Hebrew phrase, One is His beginning.
sentences.chinese: “這是一種簡稱爲希伯萊語，”他是一個開端。

sentences.english: Did you know "HE" is the 5th letter of the Hebrew alphabet?
sentences.chinese: 你知道“HE”是希伯萊文字母表中第五個字母嗎？

sentences.english: Some Hebrew letters have two pronunciations.
sentences.chinese: 有些希伯萊字母有兩種讀法。

sentences.english: The most famous is the Binding of Isaac (the akeidah ) by Abraham, the father of the Hebrew nation.
sentences.chinese: 最著名的是希伯萊民族之父亞伯拉罕獻以撒這件事。
